snippet: From the Trinity Choir and Trinity Baroque Orchestra, energetic performances of the midsection of the “Christmas Oratorio.”
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by the Trinity Choir and Trinity Baroque Orchestra at St Paul's Chapel.
lead_paragraph: From the Trinity Choir and Trinity Baroque Orchestra, energetic performances of the midsection of the “Christmas Oratorio.”

headline.seo: Trinity Choir and Baroque Orchestra’s Bach at One - Review
